price: Ô vous qui croyez ! Combattez ceux des mécréants qui sont près de vous; et qu’ils trouvent de la dureté en vous. Et sachez qu’Allah est avec les pieux.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ وَلۡيَجِدُواْ فِيكُمۡ غِلۡظَةٗۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū qātilū alladhīna yalūnakum mina al-kufāri walyajidū fīkum ghil'ẓatan wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha maʿa al-mutaqīna
